title: Tulip Style Oval Dining Table Fibreglass/Black
body: Saarinen felt too clustered with the traditional slum of the four legged chair or what he called “slum of legs” set-up in US dinning so in 1956, he came up with the Tulip Style Oval Dining Table and after more than 60 years later, the trusty tulip is still quite common in modern kitchen and dining rooms. This unique one-legged base table provides distinctive forms and stable functionality. Paired with the matching Tulip Chairs, a bold and vintage look will resonate in your dining room.
